module.name: CID Superfecta
module.description: Provides simultaneous use of, and complete control over multiple caller id data sources.
module.changelog: *12.0.1* Updated interface. Performance enhancements *2.11.16* Remove usage of really old installer methods for 2.8 and lower that no longer apply *2.11.15* https://github.com/POSSA/Caller-ID-Superfecta/commits/release/2.11 *2.11.14* Bad module name fix *2.11.13* Numerous changes *2.11.12* Update all sweden sources and some improvements and database fixes *2.11.11* Use new abstracted functions if exist *2.11.10* Resolve class confliction in FreePBX 12 *2.11.9* XBMC Updates *2.11.8* Fixes crash with improperly named class *2.11.7* Added source Gevonden.CC for Dutch numbers and fixes listed on github *2.11.6* Numerous Updates from GitHub *2.11.5* Remove stage unexpected character.. *2.11.4* Sources updates and error clean up *2.11.3* Added paginasblancas.ar and sugarcm *2.11.2* Added in PDO Database search, Regular Expressions Search, FOP2 Phonebook search, Abandon Lookup, Trunk Provided Updates, also fixed descriptions in source items *2.11.1* Added in a bunch of sources: Send To Growl, Send To URL, OpenCNAM, TAB Reloaded, CallWithUs, Send to MythTV and Asteridex *2.11.0beta4* Remove dangling symlinks. Remove all illegal sources (against TOS) *2.11.0beta2* Fix sources versioning *2.11.0beta1.2* fix xml *2.11.0beta1.1* import into online repo
